title: SoC CSD 369-0-20 Special Topics in Communication Sciences and Disorders

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The purpose of this course is to give students hands-on experience interacting with young children with autism and their families. Students will learn about assessment and intervention for children with autism. Students will learn strategies for working with families.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Uniquely human: a different way of seeing autism

subject: CSD
